text: @GavinNewsom Once again,  #SantaAna is having a massive surge in cases. Can you please help, by addressing that Latinos are disproportionately effected by the #coronavirus Please give us equitable access to testing w/in our communities. In #SantaAna alone 37% Latinos compared to 16% Caucasian
